item.title: How to join Mattermost
item.description: How to join Mattermost Welcome to Open Terms Archive. This document provides guidelines for onboarding new members and contributors joining the Open Terms Archive community on Mattermost. Open Terms Archive welcomes various contributors, including individuals, sponsors, and other entities interested in transparency from the opaqueness of terms by Big Tech services. Mattermost platform ðŸ”— Mattermost is an open-source collaboration platform with a simple, user-friendly interface. The Open Terms Archive workspace on Mattermost is divided into different channels, each catering to various aspects of the community.
